text: Random thoughts about myself I feel like I get way too excited at the beginning of any kind of friendship with people and I set myself up for disappointment  I also really love the thrill of meeting a new person  Like I genuinely find that knowing new things about someone who was a total mystery to me is amazing  I immediately think omg  this person is just like me  They could literally just have the same music taste as me and I d literally be in love with them  It s crazy  There s more to people than that  I need to accept the fact that they re not my twin or something  they re completely different and I need stop being so fucking excited   I rush things too fast at the start  I might be super friendly  I give people the impression that I wanna be friends with them forever bc in that moment that s how I feel  Slowly over time I lose interest  It s crazy bc at one point this person was everything I could think about and we clicked so well  Now suddenly I have no interest in talking to them anymore On another a completely different note  this is also something I ve noticed about myself  I treat guys and girls equally  Like I talk to a guy in completely the same way I d talk to a girl I m straight btw and actually I don t know what to do if I m genuinely interested in being with a guy  This is super weird but I feel like once things start getting sexual or something  they d lose interest in me  I m afraid they d not wanna get to know me anymore and I don t want to be used like that so yea  I can have a friendship with anyone but I can t help but see things like  why would a guy talk to me a lot if he didn t want a relationship  I don t know if that makes any sense  I feel weird talking to guys sometimes bc it feels like the only reason they have an interest in me is bc they wanna be with me or something  That might sound crazy idk
summary: I get too excited at the beginning of any kind of friendship with people and I set myself up for disappointment. I treat guys and girls equally. I don't know what to do if I'm genuinely interested in being with a guy.

text: I dont know if I m capable of Happiness I seriously dont know if I m capable of happiness in my life  Like  I ve been happy  and I know what it feels like  but the past few years I dont remember if it was happiness or just being content with where i was in life at the time   Sometimes i feel good about life but then i get uncomfortable with the feeling and i feel almost nothing again  its like my body wont accept that things are good in my life  that s what confuses me  i know my life has improved over the years  and i know im better off now than where i was in the past but i still feel empty  I cant even get up to fold my laundry most of the time   I Have an amazing GF  who i love more than anything  and shes supportive of everything i do but sometimes i cant even have sex because i feel like i wouldn t be able to perform as well as i want to  so i just dont  When we do have sex its usually amazing  why do i feel this way  why cant i even find happiness in sex  I feel bitter  and tired of trying to feel like im incapable of happiness  i feel defeated  I snap at my GF because im frustrated with my brain and than apologize after but i still feel like ive said sorry too many times  Im starting to believe im being selfish by not leaving her because of how unhappy i am but she is the only thing right now making me not give up completely   I want to feel something  i want to feel like I am not failing my girlfriend  mom  dad  and most of all myself  I m currently looking into therapy again because that has helped me in the past and i am only writing this post because i feel like i need to somehow get what im feeling like off my chest  yet it still feels like i cant explain the feeling right

text: Finding it hard to stick aroundMy life has slowly been falling apart since August   I lost my job of   years and my wife wants to split  unrelated   She says she felt like this since before I lost my job and didn t want to burden with me with it after losing my job but couldn t live like that anymore   I m not abusive   I ve done everything you re supposed to do  but I have been a little distant and I was trying to get closer to her  but I think since she felt this way she was already closed off to my attempts    Now we will have to move away from each other   I ll see less of my daughter  and less of my wife   It doesn t feel real  and I don t know how long I can be strong enough to stick around   I keep thinking that my kid is only    She will ultimately never really miss me

text: How many more straws can this camels back take I spend every day in utter turmoil  I go to work   days a week working with shitty people for a shitty boss who lives to drain the wallets of old people  I ve got nothing from school I can go on  and the one chance I had to make it into game design I passed up because I didn t think I d have the drive to complete it  I ve spent the past year of my relationship almost dead silent  don t think my girls even seen me not high in almost   years  she s not been fucked properly in half that time  not by me anyhow  part of me just wishes she d fuck someone else and find them better  The truth is if I wasn t able to get high  I would kill myself  I won t touch cocaine and heroin because I d probably like them too much Everyone around me is playing an act  I m the only audience member to a play the size of the Earth  and every dumbfuck is taking humanity off a cliff and patting themselves on the back for doing it  I drift through each day with a cold  heartless stare that frightens anyone that makes eye contact with me  Rooms literally go silent as I walk in  Not that I really care  the small part of me that s still here enjoys watching the world burn around me A few weeks ago my father got drunk  broke down and let out all his darkest secrets to me  including murder and the fact my mum is messing around on him  They had a big argument that evening  I went down to stop it and he pulled a nice big kitchen knife on me  I ve barely acknowledged him since  but around me my family is still playing out this oh so friendly act  I can recollect about   weekends from my childhood  shopping with my grandparents  everything else is blank I thought writing this out would help  but it s only confirmed how fucked I am and how much I just want it to end
summary: I'm in a bad relationship. I haven't had sex in almost a year. I'm depressed. I work for a bad boss who drains the wallets of old people. I want to kill myself. I can't remember anything from childhood apart from shopping with my grandparents.

text: Proud of myself for standing up to a maskless idiot So earlier today  I went to the tennis courts with my best friend to get back to playing after having not touched a racket for over two months  As I am walking to reserve a court and to wait for my friend a girl a little older than me  i m   cuts right past me to get a court but all the courts are full  I was a little pissed she was not wearing a mask in a small area of at least   people close together  She then mutters to herself something like   Shoot the courts are full  might have to try another place  and leaves  leaving me the next person to grab a court  She walks halfway to the parking lot and meets her dad and they talk for a minute and in that time a court opens up  I go to grab it but they come back and demand I give it to them  Well  her dad is also not wearing a mask and now I really get mad and snapped  I yelled at him saying I have every right to take this court and that he has no right to even talk to me without a mask  I then told him to shut up and get out since I was now really really mad and I know people who have died to COVID  After yelling at me a little he left with his daughter and another coach on a nearby court applauded me  It honestly felt really good to stand up for myself especially to a person like that
summary: Today I went to the tennis courts with my best friend to get back to playing after a two-month break. The courts were full and the next person to reserve a court was a girl who was not wearing a mask. She left to talk to her dad and in the meantime a court opened up and I took it. The girl's dad yelled at me, but he left with his daughter.
cleaned: today go tennis court good friend play month break court person reserve court girl not wear mask leave talk dad meantime court open take girl dad yell leave daughter
